keyword: how many calories in a chicken drumstick
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Drumstick?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a chicken drumstick, plus protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition details for roasted, skin-on varieties with easy tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Drumstick?
assumptions: Medium size (about 100g total, 75g edible), bone-in, skin-on, roasted without added oil, salt, or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by chicken size, breed, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels or reliable sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken drumstick with skin provides about 172 kcal and 19 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a roasted chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: About 172 kcal for one medium, skin-on drumstick.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: Roughly 19 g protein per roasted, skin-on drumstick.

faqs.q: Does skin-on vs. skinless change calories much?
faqs.a: Yes, skinless reduces calories by about 60 to 112 kcal total.
Yes, 0 g carbs per drumstick, making them keto-friendly.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect drumstick calories?
faqs.a: Roasting is lower; frying adds ~100 kcal due to absorbed oil.
